title: Need T 206 Frank Isbell (Chicago) banged up cards!
author: bh3443

posts.post_title: Need T 206 Frank Isbell (Chicago) banged up cards!
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone!
Does any one have a beat up T 206 card of Frank Isbell of Chicago? I am looking for one and I was wondering what else he's on. I've seen the T 206, a E card and a great post card with him inset as the manager!
Long story about Mr. Isbell: His T 206 was among the first T cards I ever owned: it was a 206 that was creased to hell with acid eating away part of the right border! lol, I'd love to get a beat up card of him for the memories!
Thank you,
Bill Hedin
3 Murray Rd
Framingham, MA 01701
